title: Glenn Hubbard: The Antidote to the Wall is the Bridge
itunes:title: Glenn Hubbard: The Antidote to the Wall is the Bridge
description: Professor Glenn Hubbard, professor of Finance and Economics at Columbia Business School, talks about his just-released book, The Wall and the Bridge: Fear and Opportunity in Disruption’s Wake, and how society and policymakers can help those who are left behind in the wake of today's competitive world.
